text: Anastas Hovhannesi Mikoyan (, Anastas Hovhannesi Mikoyan; ; â€“ 21 October 1978) was an Armenian Old Bolshevik and Soviet statesman during the Stalin and Khrushchev years. It was told that, during Khrushchev time, he was the second most powerful man in the Soviet Union. title: Anastas Mikoyan
